content: this soft thick warm beanie is made from homespun wool i intentionally left the gorgeous colors unblended for a unique artistic look there is a stockinette rectangle nestled in the ribbing it is your billboard you could embroider monogram sew quilt attach items attach a label etc in this space i ordered custom labels with gromets to add to mine after the knitting was complete you can also use the ones that are sewn on lengthen it if you prefer a slouch decrease the billboard if you prefer a smaller label space make it your own ps i m making these for gifts
